text: walayin jit -ayha alrswl- aladhin 'uetu altawrat wal'iinjil bikuli hujat wbrhan ealaa 'an twjjuhk 'iilaa alkaebat fi alsalat hu alhaqa min eind allh, maa tabieuu qiblatak enadana wastkbarana, wama 'ant bitabie qiblatahum maratan akhra, wama baeduhum bitabie qiblat bed. walayin atabaet 'ahwa'ahum fi shan alqiblat wghyrha baed ma ja'ak min aleilm bi'anak ealaa alhaqa wahum ealaa albatl, 'iinak hinayidh lamin alzaalimin lanfshm. whdha khitab lajamie al'umat wahu tahdid wweyd liman yatabie 'ahwa' almukhalifin lshryet al'islam
